Text:
Having eliminated the magic beasts from the castle,
Rose begins ordering her knights to rescue the
citizens—

I'll just have to leave the rest of those monsters
to the Shadow Garden for now.

Shadow is handling Ragnarok...and that man Mordred
is...
...What was that?!

Rose's eyes are drawn to a figure that has suddenly
fallen. It's none other than—
Ughh...ngh...
Mordred...?! Why...?!
Looks like you're hanging in there.
Lady Beta, and...
Epsilon.
Damn it... How is this possible...
I'm being bested by mere girls...?!

In astonishment, Rose looks upon Mordred, whose face
is contorted in humiliation.

Rose knew of the Seven Shadows' exceptionally high
skills. However, she never imagined the gap between
them and Mordred was to this extent.

You're not going to claim you lost because it was
two against one, are you?

It was foolish to rely on your artifacts and
challenge us, despite being outnumbered.
Tch...!
It's not over yet...Ragnarok is still here.

With Ragnarok's power, the greatest power ever
recorded in history, I can annihilate the likes of
you in an instant...!
That's a very long instant.
If that's what you're holding out for, fine.
In the meantime, we'd like to have our answers.
What?

Didn't we tell you at the start? We want you to
reveal all of your knowledge.
...Fine.

Just for a brief while before Ragnarok
incinerates you, I'll acknowledge you as my students.
GYAAAAAAA!!!
Man, this world doesn't mess around.
Even their bats are ginormous.

Shadow mutters in midair as he dodges Ragnarok's
countless attacks.

(My original plan was to watch the birth of Rose the
Monarch from off in the distance, but then there was
this huge monster outbreak.)

(This has gotta be the forces of darkness working to
hinder the monarch. When that redheaded dude
summoned the bat, it was to stop her from coming
into her own.)
GYYAOHHH!!!

With its immense magical power, Ragnarok rains
down attacks, mercilessly obliterating buildings.
Hmm. A natural disaster.
OP magic, OP power... I swear, beasts have it all—
—Huh?

Ragnarok suddenly turns back toward Shadow, and
then begins charging its magic power—
Oh.

The immense magic attack aimed at Shadow pierces
through his body with a shock.
My bangs got singed.

Shadow brushes it off like it's nothing, but in the
city below, there is a giant crater.

In times like these, you should confront things
head-on and then let it play out—
Didn't they teach that in class?

Shadow remarks, and with a flick of his fingers,
thin threads of magic immediately stretch across the
dark sky.

Numerous threads wrap around Ragnarok's entire
body, binding it.
GYAAA!
The skies are under my dominion.
Beast, engrave that knowledge in your flesh!
